amendment.description: Amendment sought to require local transit entities to have a debt to equity ratio of at least 1:1 in order to be eligible for Federal funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 14 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to require local transit entity to have a debt to equity ratio of at least 1:1 in order to be eligible for federal funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Culberson amendment Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 313 (Roll no. 603).

action.text: Amendment (A056) offered by Mr. Culberson to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
